LABEL_PORTAL_NAME_INFO: The unique name of the portal
LABEL_PORTAL_TITLE_INFO: Display name of the portal that appears on the header of the portal
LABEL_DATABASE_INFO: Operational Reference Store for the portal to use
LABEL_BUSINESS_ENTITY_INFO: Business entity to which you want to add records through the portal
LABEL_ENABLE_STATE_INFO: Indicates whether to use portal states to refer to the status of the records. You can also use the portal states to control access to the portal pages
LABEL_STATE_CONF_TABLE_NAME_INFO: Name of the reference entity that stores the states for the portal
LABEL_STATE_CONF_COLUMN_NAME_INFO: Name of the field that contains the state values
LABEL_STATE_CONF_FILTER_BY_COLUMN_INFO: Name of the field based on which you want to filter the state values so that you can use only a subset of state values in the portal
LABEL_STATE_CONF_FILTER_BY_VALUE_INFO: Value based on which you want to filter the states
LABEL_ROLE_REFERENCE_ENTITY_INFO: Name of the reference entity that stores the portal user roles
LABEL_ROLE_FIELD_NAME_INFO: Name of the field that contains the portal user roles
LABEL_LOGO_INFO: URL of an image that you want to use as logo of the portal
LABEL_HEADER_BACKGROUND_COLOR_INFO: Background color of the header of the portal
LABEL_FOOTER_TEXT_INFO: Text to display on the footer of the portal
LABEL_FOOTER_BACKGROUND_COLOR_INFO: Background color of the footer of the portal

LABEL_USERS_INFO: Specify the business entity fields for the listed user details
LABEL_PORTAL_STATES_INFO: Business entity field that stores the portal state of the user.

LABEL_SIGNUP_USER_ROLE_INFO: Default user role to assign after a user registers
LABEL_TABLE_USER_ROLE_INFO: Business entity field that stores the user role.
LABEL_TABLE_USER_NAME_INFO: Business entity field that stores the user name.
LABEL_TABLE_EMAIL_INFO: Business entity field that stores the email address.

LABEL_NO_CHILD_FIELDS: No fields available to show Dynamic View On option

LABEL_SELECT_DYNAMIC_VIEW_FIELD: Select the business entity fields associated with the dynamic view.
LABEL_USER_MAP_TO_EMAIL: Use email address as user name
LABEL_USER_MANAGE_STATE: Allowed States to Create Additional Users

LABEL_LOGIN_FIELD_MAPPING_MESSAGE: Specify the business entity fields that contain the user details.For example, User Name: Contacts.contacts.portlUsrNm
LABEL_LOGIN_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_INFO: Configure the email templates to use for different actions.
LABEL_INVITATION_INFO: Email template to use when additional users are invited to the portal.
LABEL_RESET_PASSWORD_SUCCESS_INFO: Email template to use after a password is successfully reset.
LABEL_RESET_PASSWORD_INFO: Email template to use when users request to reset their password.
LABEL_REGISTRATION_SUCCESS_INFO: Email template to use after a user is successfully registered.
LABEL_COUNTRY_DIALING_CODE_INFO: Name of the field to store the country dialing code.
LABEL_PHONE_NUMBER_INFO: Name of the field to store the phone number.
LABEL_JOB_TITLE_INFO: Name of the field to store the title of the user profile.
LABEL_SECTION_HEADING_INFO: Section title for the user creation page.
LABEL_URL_INFO: URL of the external page that you want to display on the portal.
LABEL_SERVER_URL_INFO: URL to access the MDM - Product 360 Supplier Portal.
LABEL_PRODUCT_USER_INFO: Name of the user with administrative privileges to access the Product 360 Supplier Portal.
LABEL_PARAMETER_INFO: Parameter to filter the content of the external page.
LABEL_EXTERNAL_ID_PATH_INFO: Row ID of the business entity record.
LABEL_DELETE_SECTION_DIALOG_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this section ?
LABEL_DELETE_SECTION_DIALOG_FAILURE_TITL: Cannot delete the last section, Press Ok to continue.
LABEL_PUBLISH_RUNNING_PORTAL: Portal should be Stopped in order to Publish
LABEL_CUSTOM_HEIGHT_INFO: Height of the page in pixel.
LABEL_DISPLAY_HEIGHT_INFO: The style or measurement you want for the page size.
LABEL_ASSOCIATED_TASK_TYPE_INFO: The name of the task that you want to associate with the page.
LABEL_PRIMARY_ACTION_INFO: The default action to display on the wizard.
LABEL_LOGOUT_ACTIONS_INFO: Comma-seperated list of actions that log out a user after the actions are performed.

LABEL_CLOSE_EDIT_PAGE: Do you really want to close the Edit Page wizard ?

LABEL_HIDE_PARENT_IF_NO_CHILD: Hide the parent field with no child
LABEL_HIDE_PARENT_IF_NO_CHILD_INFO: Hide the parent one-to-many field value when its child one-to-many field has no associated values.
LABEL_LOGIN_PORTAL_NAME_INFO: Business entity field that stores the name of the portal for login.
LABEL_USER_MANAGE_PORTAL_NAME_INFO: Business entity field that stores the name of the portal for signup.
LABEL_INVALID_CONFIG_INFO: During upgrade, some new fields are added to the portal. You must configure those fields before using the portal.
LABEL_COMPONENT_DELETE_MESSAGE_CONTENT: Are you sure you want to delete the {{COMPONENT_NAME}} component ?
LABEL_TEXT_HEADING_INFO: Heading for the descriptive text that you want to display.
LABEL_TWITTER_URL_INFO: URL of the Twitter account from which you want to retrieve the Twitter feeds.
LABEL_TITLE_INFO: Title that appears on the home page of the wizard.
LABEL_BODY_INFO: Description that appears on the home page of the wizard.
LABEL_DISABLE_REGISTRATION_INFO: Indicates whether to allow users to register on the portal
LABEL_DISABLE_REGISTRATION_EXTERNAL_USER: The registration process is not available when you enable external authentication
LABEL_ENABLE_SSO_INFO: Indicates whether to enable authentication based on SSO
LABEL_SSO_FORGOT_PASSWORD_INFO: Specifies the URL through which users can find the instructions to reset their password
LABEL_USER_NAME_MAPPING_INFO: Specifies the attribute that contains the user name in the identity provider response. For example: NameID
LABEL_SSO_CLOSE_DIALOG_TITLE: Do you really want to close the SSO Configurations ?
LABEL_SSO_SERVICE_PROVIDER_CONFIG_TEXT: Download the service provider metadata file. If you update the service provider settings, save the changes. After you update the service provider settings, download the service provider metadata file.
LABEL_SSO_IDENTITY_PROVIDER_CONFIG_TEXT: Upload the Service Provider federation metadata XML file for configuring the identify provider.
LABEL_ISSUER_ID_SP_INFO: Specifies a unique ID to identify the service provider
LABEL_ISSUER_IDP_INFO: Specifies a unique ID to identify the identity provider
LABEL_ASSERTION_CONSUMER_URL_INFO: Specifies the URL for the identify provider to redirect the user after authentication
LABEL_BINDING_TYPE_INFO: Specifies the single sign-on binding standard used for message transmission
LABEL_SINGLE_SIGN_ON_REDIRECT_URL_INFO: Specifies the URL to redirect users after authentication
LABEL_SINGLE_SIGN_OUT_REDIRECT_URL_INFO: Specifies the URL to redirect users after they sign out
LABEL_SINGLE_SIGN_OUT_URL_POST_INFO: Specifies the single logout URL of the service provider
LABEL_SINGLE_SIGN_ON_URL_INFO: Specifies the single sign-on URL of the service provider
LABEL_SIGN_IN_CERTIFICATE_INFO: Specifies the single sign-on digital certificate used for authentication
LABEL_SSO_DIALOG_BODY_STEPS_CONFIGURE: Use the following steps to configure single sign-on (SSO):
LABEL_SSO_DIALOG_BODY_STEP_ONE: Download the metadata file from the SSO Configurations section.
LABEL_SSO_DIALOG_BODY_STEP_TWO: Upload the metadata file to your identity provider portal. For example, Okta or Microsoft Azure.
LABEL_SSO_DIALOG_BODY_STEP_THREE: Download the federation metadata XML file from your identity provider portal.
LABEL_SSO_DIALOG_BODY_STEP_FOUR: Upload the federation metadata XML file to the Identity Provider Settings section.
